name: Prompt
description: Prompt is a hardcore platformer. It is minimalist, it is retro, and it is very, very hard. Everything from the visual style to the design of every level has been coded with love, just for you.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or higher Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 Storage: 200 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Addictingly frustrating platformer, wrapped up in retro minimalist goodness.
